alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 10:45AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coconino County between Frazier`s Well and Valle through 1115 AM MST... At 1044 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles east of Rose Well, or 48 miles southwest of Desert View at Grand Canyon, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Coconino County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
